uint16 MD_HkTlm_t::DwellEnabledMask

Each bit in bit mask enables a table 0x0001=TBL1 enable bit,0x0002=TBL2 enable bit, 0x0004=TBL3 enable bit,0x0008=TBL4 enable bit, etc.
